installCommand: if [ -d frontend ] && [ -f frontend/package.json ] && [ -d backend ] && [ -f backend/package.json ]; then npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend; else npm install; fi
buildCommand: if [ -d frontend ] && [ -f frontend/package.json ]; then npm run build --prefix frontend && rm -rf dist && cp -r frontend/dist dist; else npm run build; fi
